CODIFIED ORDINANCES OF SPRINGBORO, OHIO

PART TWELVE - PLANNING AND ZONING CODE

TITLE SIX - Zoning

CHAPTER 1272 Planned Unit Developments

1272.01 INTENT AND OBJECTIVES.

1272.02 DEFINITIONS.

1272.03 PERMITTED USES; CATEGORIES OF PUDS .

1272.04 AREA, DENSITY AND LOT REGULATIONS.

1272.05 INTERIOR STREETS.

1272.06 COLLECTOR STREETS AND MAJOR THOROUGHFARES.

1272.07 OFF-STREET PARKING.

1272.08 COMMON OPEN SPACE.

1272.09 PEDESTRIAN, BICYCLE CIRCULATION.

1272.10 UNDERGROUND UTILITIES REQUIRED.

1272.11 PRIVACY.

1272.12 EROSION AND SEDIMENTATION CONTROL.

1272.125 EXTERIOR FACADE DESIGN STANDARDS.

1272.13 SUBDIVISION REVIEW; CONFLICTS.

1272.14 ESTABLISHMENT OF PUD.

1272.15 PRE-APPLICATION CONFERENCE RECOMMENDED.

1272.16 PUD APPLICATION STEP 1: AMENDMENT OF OFFICIAL ZONING MAP AND GENERAL PLAN APPROVAL.

1272.17 AMENDMENT OF OFFICIAL ZONING MAP, GENERAL PLAN APPROVAL.

1272.18 REVISION OF APPROVED GENERAL PLAN.

1272.19 PUD APPLICATION STEP 2: FINAL DEVELOPMENT PLAN.

1272.20 CONDITIONS FOR APPROVAL OF FINAL DEVELOPMENT PLAN.

1272.21 FINAL DEVELOPMENT PLAN APPROVAL.

1272.22 PUD APPLICATION STEP 3: RECORD PLAN.

1272.23 FAILURE TO BEGIN OR CONTINUE PLANNED UNIT DEVELOPMENT.

1272.24 REVISION OF APPROVED FINAL DEVELOPMENT PLAN.

1272.25 PHASING.

1272.26 VIOLATIONS.
